SELECT t.*, arm.Name_ processName FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT(pts.process_instance_id) processInstanceId, ahp.BUSINESS_KEY_ businessKey, SUBSTRING_INDEX( ahp.PROC_DEF_ID_, ':', 1 ) processKey, IFNULL( aru.suspension_state_, 1 ) suspensionState, pts.`status`, ahp.START_TIME_ startTime, ahp.START_USER_ID_ originator, ahp.END_TIME_ finishTime, ahp.DURATION_ duration FROM ext_process_status pts LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst ahp ON ahp.PROC_INST_ID_ = pts.process_instance_id LEFT JOIN act_ru_execution aru ON aru.PROC_INST_ID_ = pts.process_instance_id AND aru.suspension_state_ = 2 ) t LEFT JOIN act_re_model arm ON t.processKey = arm.key_
where arm.NAME_ like CONCAT(#{name},'%')
order by t.businessKey DESC
